answerText: NaCl or sodium chloride[10] Because NaCl is a face-centered cubic system, its atomic packing factor has this value, which is the optimum value.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 14 - Finals 2 | 7 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: A common introductory physics laboratory demonstration is to dissolve this substance in a tube full of water and watching how the conductivity of the tube increases. For 10 points each: [10] Name this substance which is a face-centered cubic crystal system. It is also known as halite or table salt.
